name: Blaster Simulator
description: Allow your intent to destroy free play and become a blaster! With skill, you reach the required rate of destruction and you will win the fight against your competitors to get new jobs - only the best will get the most explosive contract of all times.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® Me / 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 /8 / 10 Processor: Intel or AMD with min. 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce®, AMD Radeon® with min. 128 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY. Bad controls no option looks like ♥♥♥ and it plays like ♥♥♥. i regret buying this game.
